title: Enrich yourself with a lifetime subscription to Curiosity Stream — 55% off until July 14
content:
Macworld

There are a lot of choics out there when it comes to streaming subscriptions. Few, however, are as enriching as the Emmy Award-winning Curiosity Stream. And since you can get a lifetime subscription for way less than normal during our Deal Days Sale, it’s as affordable as ever.

Deal Days is our version of Prime Day where you’ll find some of the biggest savings of the year on everything from subscriptions to electronics. Take this offer for Curiosity Stream as an example — A lifetime subscription would normally cost $400 but, from now until July 14 at 11:59 pm, you’ll save $220 off the regular cost which makes it a pretty impressive deal.

With Curiosity Stream you’ll enjoy unlimited access to thousands of HD-quality documentary programs. Just sign on to your account using a compatible device such as a computer, phone, or a TV box such as an Android TV or Apple TV. There’s content to suit everyone, you can download shows to view offline, and new programming is added weekly.

If you find that the usual streaming options are getting a little stale, then give Curiosity Stream a try — Get a lifetime subscription for just $179.97, no coupon codes required, until July 14 at 11:59 pm.
